title: Could I wear Mordekaiser without any adverse effects?
body:
If I crawled up inside him what would he even be able to do?

Nothing. That's what. I'm gonna get deep up inside of him and he can't do anything about it. He has to let me in. He has to let me stay inside him and wear him like.. Like a suit of armor.

replies.body: As a Mordekaiser main, I am deeply offended, both by the though of you doing that, and the though that you could get anywhere near him without getting a mace to the face and dying
Is this a fetish or something?

> [{quoted}](name=AngusBoomPants,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0lKBN5LA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-03-30T22:58:10.305+0000)
>
> Is this a fetish or something?

Everything is a fetish to someone

"It doesn't take all kinds, we just have all kinds"
-Someone, probably
I feel personally violated.
Ah, there he is.
You would not be able to eat tacos
Even if you could somehow pull this off, would you even want to? That suit of armor has to be pretty gross, what with all the bugs that live in it.

I'm pretty sure he could just suck your soul out and kill you if you tried.

Source: his W, E and Ult
You'd probably chafe.
https://junkee.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Thanus.jpg

i suppose if he even let you in there and keep your arms and legs in the main part you'd be fine.

If you're somehow big enough to fit in the armor, he'd probably control you like a puppet as he moves. i doubt you're gonna be physically strong enough to stop morde.

> [{quoted}](name=Jerry SeinfeId,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0lKBN5LA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-30T22:04:15.368+0000)
>
> i suppose if he even let you in there and keep your arms and legs in the main part you'd be fine.
> 
> If you're somehow big enough to fit in the armor, he'd probably control you like a puppet as he moves. i doubt you're gonna be physically strong enough to stop morde.

Just build more AD than him.

if you were in a romantic relationship with mordekaiser that would be the best way to cuddle with him tbh :/

(i'm sorry for typing this)

I wouldn't.
Who knows what kind of Bugs he keeps in that Set of Armor of his.
friend im all about living your bliss if you wanna wear Mordekaiser then chase that dream, be the Kayn Ulti you wanna see in the world
Till your forced to reap with your reaping slash using your scythe. Then die
Chances are he'd probably contort his armor in some odd way so that he squishes you while you are inside, like an iron maiden.
A fool would think the Master of Metal wouldn't be able to Crush his own Armor and leave you a lifeless husk, before reshaping the contours of his armor back in place.
Youâ€™d probably glitch out of existence.

Crawl inside me metal ddy. 

Oops, wrong ho- way.

Alphonse reference? Full metal alchemist reference

Where's Edward at lol
... ooh kay ...
